name: Left 4 Dead2: Shelter
description:
This is a L4D2 Survival Map  for the Level Design Jam 3.

It was my first attempt at using Hammer and L4D2 assets and commands to make a functional level.

I wanted to go with the idea of defending a home from swarming zombies, that begin to overwhelm the structure of the house by breaking down the walls and windows , making you more exposed over time.

I learnt lots and will hope to take these learnings to more future levels.
